DOC.brief_summary: To establish if heated humidified carbon dioxide gas improves pain scores as well as nausea and analgesic requirements in post operative patients compared to standard cold carbon dioxide.
DOC.brief_title: Standard Carbon Dioxide Gas Versus Heated Humidified Gas in Gynaecological Laparoscopy
DOC.criteria: Patients over 18 years of age Patients planned to undergo laparoscopy for minor procedures such as endometriosis, adhesions, ovarian cystectomies, bilateral salpingoophorectomy, tubal ligation and sterilisation will be invited to participate in the trial. Capacity to consent Patients unable to speak English Patients unable to give consent
